creditline: Gift of Frederick T. and Margaret M. Boehm
description: scene with a gray stone path in foreground, leading up steps to temple gate with black roof, surrounded by brown walled structures with black trim; main building has black winged eaves on top and red openings on either side of center entrance
inscription: BC in pencil: Ōbaku-San Uji (A) | LR in pencil: 1960 | LR in pencil: 88/150
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ōbaku-san, Uji (A)
